name: Gang of four (itch)
description:
This game is a game about team work. Collect all your spirit pieces to get new skills and powers! However, every spirit makes you bigger. Be careful! The game was made to the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.1

Some game features:

1) You can break the red blocks if you have collected 3/3 of the spirits

2) Trampolines work if you have collected less than 3 spirits
